title: Сломанная стрела
overview: Broken Arrow (2025)Riot police officer Maksim recently lost his daughter. This event had a devastating effect on his psychological state. After another attack of aggression, Maksim's boss forces him to go on vacation. At this moment, a call comes from an old friend of Egor, who invites Maksim to spend a vacation in Sochi. Fresh air and sunshine should have put the riot policeman's thoughts in order, but everything is happening quite the opposite. A series of events leads him to the village of gold miners, where a priceless artifact was recently discovered.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt32881254/plotsummary?item=ps8027176
